channel.title: Still need help with Running a [508] on Hamachi
channel.description:
Well, i tried everything..
Can some one explain in steps what i need to do exactly..

item.title: Still need help with Running a [508] on Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

[quote=“Zeroh, post:12, topic:279401”]Okay bud here I’ll use the terms you understand.

Make an account on Hamachi.

As soon as you do. You should see this…

Just type that Ip in that you see on yours and your good to go. Remember type yours in Not mine lol[/quote]

So:
im running my server: on normal port
my friends using a ip changer and uses my ip and he is in my hamachi
he must log in?

Read full topic

why not just portforward your router, make a no-ip and make it public instead of using hamachi,

item.title: Still need help with Running a [508] on Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

[quote=“Menno582, post:4, topic:279401”][quote author=Meryntje link=topic=368723.msg2791888#msg2791888 date=1242831598]

Well, i tried everything…

Can some one explain in steps what i need to do exactly…

And the ip for client?

Create a new network with Hamachi, then join it, and log-in.

[/quote]

You can use 127.0.0.1 or Localhost, others your no-IP at
www.no-ip.org …[/quote]

Ok im going to try now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2009, 12:24:17 pm[/size][hr]My friend is trying

and he gets er error_game_js5connect
Ive got hamachi on and hes in my network

he did 127.0.0.1 in his ip changer client…

what am i doing rong :S

Read full topic
